generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible on the pavement along the sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs.
- building: Multiple buildings with storefronts and windows line both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- person: Several pedestrians are standing or walking on the sidewalk.
- rider: Two individuals are riding bicycles on the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the road, and a few are driving on the road.
- truck: An orange truck is visible in the distance, driving on the road.
- bicycle: Two bicycles are visible, being ridden by riders.
